p: Methods: Unplanned patient referrals were prospectively enrolled in a review cohort. Data included patient demographics, acute physiological parameters, prior hospital length of stay (LOS), Canadian Clinical Frailty Scale (CCFS) and comorbidities. Logistic regression analysis was used to assess factors influencing admission, using STATA 14.1. Results are expressed as median (interquartile range) and odds ratios (OR) with confidence intervals (CI).
